sources.title: Bulldog Edition (1936) CRIME DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: Ray Walker, Evalyn Knapp, Regis Toomey 
Director: Charles Lamont

Two rival newspapers are engaged in a circulation battle, complicated by the fact that a vicious gangster inserts himself into the middle of it. Further complicating matters is that one newspaper's editor and its circulation director are competing for the affections of a pretty blonde reporter!

metadata.Plot: Two rival newspapers are engaged in a circulation battle, complicated by the fact that a vicious gangster inserts himself into the middle of it. Also complicating matters is that one newspaper's editor and circulation director are competing for the affections of a pretty blonde reporter.
metadata.Writer: Richard English, Karen DeWolf, Daniel Ahern
metadata.Actors: Ray Walker, Evalyn Knapp, Regis Toomey
